caption: Wonderful restaurant, with a very attentive excellent waitress that made sure our glasses were never empty. The food was top notch, lobster ravioli is amazing. If you enjoy wine this is the place to go as well. They also provide fresh focaccia with a dish of olive oil and balsamic kalamatas upon arrival.
Very good... I had Cioppino very large portion probably could feed two to three people very very tasty

I have only ever ordered from here off of DoorDash so I have no comments on the service or atmosphere. I ordered the mushroom ravioli and it was just okay. I would be willing to order from here again but maybe try another dish. If I ever do so I will update my review accordingly.

Food is great and restaurant employees were accommodating even during this pandemic. My companion and I were looking for a place to eat and was too tired to look further and went inside hoping they are open. Since this is our first time, we …
Food and food presentation is bomb! Awesome customer service!:)

I come to this excellent restaurant often since I enjoy the good air that is unique to this restaurant. The team is very loving and professional. The service is certainly efficient. Not to mention, the food they cook is perfect. I have been …

Very good food, clean setting, and thankfully, this place was actually open for indoor dining on Sat, Nov 14.  The service includes the waitress grating Parmigiano cheese from Italy onto our plates.  The dinner serving sizes could have been …
I went here for my 18th birthday and had the mushroom ravioli. Best mushroom ravioli I ever had.

Picked up a to go order. Worst chicken marsala I've ever had in my life. Chicken was super dry, submerged in some kind of tomato sauce, not marsala sauce. Came with penne pasta tossed in tomato sauce, should have been angel hair, spaghetti, or linguine. This was awful, the worst.
The food is barely ok, and very few customers so I am questioning the freshness of ingredients

I ordered DoorDash from this restaurant because they were the only Italian restaurant I could find with vegetables in their pasta. I ordered a plate and got exactly two pieces of spinach included and zero sun dried tomatoes. Rated two stars instead of one because their sauce was pretty good.
Very nice Italian food. Good location and friendly waitstaff.
This restaurant has great service as well as delightful meals. The best spot around town. The food arrived rapidly and the rates were reasonable. I recommend this place.
Fantastic food and service!
The service is constantly efficient, great atmosphere, very nice staff members. Will eat here again when I get in town.
(Translated by Google) Nice place and wonderful attention 🙏 blessings for this new year  (Original) Bonito lugar y maravillosa atención 🙏 bendiciones para este nuevo año
Very good
Great service good food
Food options were a little more seafood based and missed some of the Italian staples I was looking for, but ambience and staff were very good and friendly
Great food! Attentive service! Lovely setting. Expansive menu. Something for everyone. Vegetarians very happy here! Torte lemoncello was heavenly. A great night out with friends.
Excellent food. Great service & atmosphere.
Great food, great service. Glad we found this place.
Really delicious food and excellent service! Had a seafood risotto (daily special) and found carpaccio on the menu which I haven't had I years! Highly recommend, I'll definitely be back again.
Love all food !!
Delicious food and attentive service
Good food

Service was pretty good but we did have to wait a bit even though the restaurant was empty. The appetizers (calamari fritte and bruschetta) were small and not very good. The clam linguini was fishy and should be taken off the menu, …
The food is very delicious...the service is OK...
The food was very good and the service was great.
Good food! Good location! Good entertainment!

(Translated by Google) In ristorante di parma of my Sister fidelina Flores thanks fidelina congratulations very rich the food  (Original) En ristorante di parma de mi Hermana fidelina Flores gracias fidelina felicidades muy rica la comida

We came here with friends and the place is spacious! We ordered the fried calamari to start and it was crunchy and tasty! Then for our entrees, we had chicken ravioli with pesto (which was a special), penne with sausage, lobster ravioli, and linguine with clams. Portions are hearty and I enjoyed my tasty penne with sausage.
Great Italian food!!!

And now there is a third good Italian restaurant in Hayward with the addition of 'Ristorante Di Palermo' joining 'Aqua e Farina' and 'Bon Appetito!' The city has pumped millions of dollars into the new downtown traffic pattern, building …

Would give 0 stars if possible.... I went for a paint nite event for my birthday and the restaurant was double booked so they had us sit in the front of the restaurants and we couldn't order any food...no apology just oh well we are too busy catering. What bad service.
Excellent foods, fresh and tasty! Great service. Will go there again.

We asked for a special private booth, which they only have three, for a birthday celebration. They were very accommodating, the food was wonderful, and our waiter -I believe his name was something like Antonio, was absolutely fabulous, and …
Great service and food.  The restaurant was sold, there is a similar restaurant in it's place now.  The food is not great especially at the prices offered.
Food is a Bombay 🙃
Food was okay. Customer service was decent. Nothing really thrilled though

The food is good as is the service. However, it doesn't look like much from the outside and even when you enter it's not a great ambiance for the interior. But if you're interested in good food, they seem to have done a good job here. Prices are also reasonable.
Really good Italian food for a good price
Food was excellent! Waite staff attentive and helpful in ordering. Clean inside and restroom. Reasonably priced.
Great food and service
Food was outstanding! Going back asap.

WOW, this place is a joke. First, my party had made a reservation, walked in and they had no idea about it. Luckily, they had a table for us (or so we thought). After they fix the table, they ask us to sit and then walk away (no menus, …

What a terrible experience... Perhaps the worst restaurant experience of my life. We had reservations at 7pm. We walked in and stood at the front counter for about 5 minutes before we were even greeted.  I mentioned we had reservations for …
Slow service and food quality was poor for the price charged. Won't be back
Solid lunch, I'd go again. Chicken marsala is a great choice, but everything I saw looked great.
Unequivalently delicious. This place is a keeper. Portobello ravioli.

Pass by here ALL the time and every time I do I say to myself I’m going to eat there one day well today I DID!!! yesss and it was SOoo Good Seriously pene pasta with delicious seared Italian sausage meatballs in a meaty tomato sauce that …

I got the shrimp and Italian sausage with gorgonzola sauce. Delicious! I should have just got the cream sauce that it came with instead of changing the recipe because that cream sauce is to die for!!!!
Went with a group of mine people, service was good and good was delicious. Everyone enjoyed their dish
Good food and service!!
My son and me had  a great  dinner.
Food, atmosphere, and service were great. Prices are reasonable too. All-in-all, it was a good value.

I've only been here one time. Parking not easy. To far to walk from back to front entrance, handicapped and pulling a oxy tank. Too old to have to try to park. Food was good, I ate it all. Prices good compared to same type other places.

Went to this restaurant this evening with my son. I have been here a few times since it opened. This evening I had the calamari steak. It was very good, with a butter-sauce and capers, and was very tender. Calamari can get tough when cooked poorly. The dish came with mixed veggies and polenta (good when scooped through the butter-sauce).
Great food, from appetizers, mains and desserts
Good food and selection, parking is tough
Nice Italian restaurant at Hayward area. Food was good and priced fairly. Corkage was $10 per bottle.
Delicious food, friendly staff, always available tables without wait.

My friends and I decided to try this place for a goodbye meal before they returned home. We couldn't be happier with our choice! Staff was super attentive and friendly and the food was delicious and reasonably priced. We are going to make it a tradition to go here every time they come to visit.
New management, still great food.
The food was good. Service was nice.

This is a updated historical place to eat in downtown Hayward. This place has been here forever. I am glad to see it updated over the years. Excellent food and service is not too shabby. Parking in the back. I do like thier Gnocchi and …
Italian food

The food was very good.  My wife and I both had the crab and shrimp ravioli. They were served in a Vodka style red sauce that allows the delicate seafood flavor to come through.  The restaurant was very quiet and the setting is very nice. …
Excellent presentation and delicious food.
Came here one afternoon for a painting class and had lunch. Didn't expect one of the best Caesar salad I've ever had. Food was awesome.
Overpriced small portions and not great taste
OMG. ITS EVERYTHING YOU WANT IN ITALIAN FOOD. Its better than bon appetite. My new go to for italian food.
Great!
Great food and service.  My first choice for Italian food in Hayward.
Food was great. Enjoyed a holiday party there. They even created my coffee drink that wasnt on the menu.

My family enjoys this restaurant.  The food is good and the atmosphere is casual.  The Waite staff have all been nice. The restaurant is a decent size place. On some weekends they host various group on events. The parking can be a bit …

Ok food but not very much variety and VERY slow service. By the time she remembered to bring us our bread plates, the bread was already gone and we had to ask for more instead of them offering like they should have.
This place was fun

Perfect 100% Are whole party is satisfied. It was everything we hoped for and more. My sister-in-law took us there for Christmas Dinner. From the Appetizers to the Main Entree to Desert. It could not have been any better. We're looking forward to returning. HAPPY NEW YEAR !! Lisa S.
Paint Nite
Great tasting Italian food. Their service is great also.
Tiramisu is simply delicious! Seafood pasta is excellent if you like a variety of seafood.

We had a 2 year old gift certificate and decided to cash in. My girlfriend and I both ordered chicken dishes.. OMG! This Chef really knows what he is doing. I highly recommend this place. And the waiter was very friendly, knowledgeable and made the experience even better.. we will be back soon.
Parking absolutely sucks. Food is ok. Waitresses are great.
Above average Italian spot - the wine seemed a bit high by the glass.

Never disappointed. I came here with a friend on my way home from work. The chef was amazing along with the waiter. My friend and I ordered their special of the day (pasta with lobster or crab and shrimp) and a chocolate cake for dessert. …
Not white table but very close. Prices are well suited and service was great. First time we ordered the Lobster Ravioli and Calamari. All was fresh and delicious.
Food was delicious, staff attentive. A nice place for Hayward
Food was very good. Service was just adequate.
Excellent food and service. We had a wonderful time.
The food was good but tomato sauce a little sweet for me. Place was not busy but we waited 25 minutes before they took our order. Another 25 minutes to get our food. Service was very slow.

(Translated by Google) If you travel to San Francisco, do not miss Hayward, this Italian restaurant has good service and the food is good.  (Original) Si viajan para San Francisco no dejen de pasar a Hayward, este restaurant italiano tiene un buen servicio y la comida está buena qué se

This has to be the very  best restaurant  in California. Fresh Friendly Service behind expectations Excellent  Cuisine Great Prices. I am one of those funny people that don't like eating out. This is only restaurant I will take joy in fine dining right in Hayward. Fresh quality ingredients!!!  I give it **********stars.
Great food great owners
Very good food
The food was delicious. The server was friendly. Definitely a nice comfy feeling. Couldn't have had a better dinner, everything was perfect.
Friendly. Good food
Great service, good food and nice ambiance
Great Dimond in the rough.

Ordered the lamb kabobs and they came with kuss Kuss and I was really surprised. It was amazing. My wife got the salmon which was wonderful with carrots broccoli and really good rich mashed potatoes with a light cheese sauce. Whoa so good. …

Great Italian Restaurant!  I was worried about parking, however I was able to park right in front.  What a clean, cheerful place this is.  A gem in downtown Hayward.  We were there for lunch.  It was hard to choose one dish, so my friend …

THIS PLACE IS SO CUTE. I'm so glad my date found this place! It was the perfect restaurant for Valentine's Day. They had live music (the singer was amazing) and it felt like you were in Italy because of the decor and the lighting.  We were …

Burgers are great and come in three sizes. A basket of steak fries can easily be shared. And don't forget a shake!!!! You actually get enough to serve up two glasses. Just a note - they don't take credit cards.
Called for a party of 10 , no problem. Huge area great food ! Nice privet area for kids in the family .

“Change through the years” The diner has not changed over the many years and has been dining there. I have been going there for over 20 years now, taking my friends and family in the early years. These days I don't go as much.

The location and setting is perfect. A small restraint in what feels like the middle of a residential neighborhood. A family owned and run business and it feels that way. Super friendly, super clean, and personalized decor. A mix between a rustic hunting cabin and a 50"s Diner.
“Great place for lunch” we went in at about 11:45am which just beat the lunch rush. Service and food was great. The burger was cooked as ordered and the milkshake was more than I could finish

“Fantastic” My husband and I like to try new places when we go out. Now that is going to be very hard to do because I am always going to want to go the Favorite Indian Restaurant! From the moment we walked in we were warmly welcomed, seated right away and shown the buffet.
Service too slow and food is mediocre
Food is awesome. Good beer choices. Service was good. Although they may want to put a couple more TV's in the bar area.

I've come here a few times and really love the service they're always so kind and upbeat! The servers always make sure we're taken care of. The food is delicious and tastes really authentic and homemade. No complaints here!
The food was to die for! Excellent customer service. Just an authentic Italian restaurant.
This is a fun spot in downtown Hayward, obviously very popular with locals for good reason. The menu is extensive and you can also bring your own wine.
The presentation was good, but the taste wasn't as good as I had hoped. The chocolate cake was good tho!
Excellent foods & services

Great Hot Dogs, a crunch with each bite. The dining experience is like going back to the 1950's. I think most of the servers have been working at Casper's for a long time. They really give you the small town diner experience!
Awesome place for Italian food that is authentic!
This restaurant was a nice place to have lunch and dinner. The food was good. Both times I went there the restaurant was not crowded which was nice. Hard for parking, but otherwise nice place.
Great food, good service, average prices
“Great tacos!!” Excellent food. Loved the chicken tacos. I would highly recommend you make the time if you want great food for a good price.

“Great ice cream” West's has great ice cream of course, but it also has a great history. After reading Jeff Millers book, I had to go check it out for myself (even though he sold it the year before) and a few people from the book still work there, it was fun talking with them about Jeff, and enjoying the great homemade ice...

Outstanding food !  Ordered the bruschetta it was amazing, the bread is homemade and toasted yummy. 😀  The calamari piccata was also awesome, including real vegetables freshly cooked and a light pasta.  Bread before makes for a complete …
The food was really good, unfortunately the service was lacking. Our server kept disappearing, and twice another server had to come and take care of us.
Awesome!!
Delicious! Beautiful! Elegant!
Rather fails the value test for me: not quite nice enough for the price.
Good food ..😋😋😋😋

The waiter was incredibly condescending. Every time we asked a question, he acted like we were the most idiotic people he had ever met. The high quality of the food saved this from being a 2 star review. However, since we were made to feel like we didn't belong here, we'll honor his wishes and not come back.

I'll sum it up for you. The owners are passionate about their food, and it shows. From the appetizers to through the dessert you won't be disappointed. Excellent food, freshly made with quality ingredients. You can taste the difference. The …

I am not sure why we never tried this place right away. We pass by it all the time looking for a good place to eat Italian Food when Buon Appetite is full.  Wow!!! What a gem to miss! The ambience issue excellent! Food is excellent! And …
